GSD.product_version: versions from v3.5 to before v4.19.265
GSD.description:
btrfs: fix inode list leak during backref walking at resolve_indirect_refs()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.265 by commit cded2c89774b99b67c98147ae103ea878c92a206, it was introduced in version v3.5 by commit 3301958b7c1dae8f0f5ded63aa881e0b71e78464. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: btrfs: fix inode list leak during backref walking at resolve_indirect_refs()
OSV.details:
